Docs.param: The name of the command to perform. This tells you what to do and how to interpret the rest of the arguments.
If true, the caller is requesting that a result, appropriate for the command, be returned back.
Docs.summary: Process a command that was sent to the wallpaper with M:Android.App.WallpaperManager.SendWallpaperCommand(Android.OS.IBinder,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String).
